'''Joe Biggs''' is a former [[InfoWars]] employee who is a leader of the [[Proud Boys]]. He is currently on trial for seditious conspiracy and other charges because he was one of the leaders of the [[January 6th Insurrection]].

Biggs was an on air host on InfoWars, before leaving to focus on the Proud Boys full time. Before being banned from Twitter, he was also an influential hate-monger there.
